title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Multimodal Learning via VR for Multilingual Learners' Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and fundamental scientific concepts used in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts (e.g., molecular structures, energy conversion) with over 80% accuracy using multimodal (visual, auditory, tactile) materials in a VR environment.
Learners can represent abstract scientific concepts in three or more ways by comparing VR simulations with text/diagrams.
Learners achieve a 20% or greater improvement in science concept comprehension scores after exchanging feedback with peers through collaborative activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
